import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function HomePage() { const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", mobile: "", address: "", email: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; // ‚úÖ Submit to backend API const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/emergency/create", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); const result = await response.json(); console.log() if (response.ok) { alert("‚úÖ Emergency request submitted successfully!"); setShowForm(false); setFormData({ name: "", mobile: "", address: "", email: "" }); } else { alert(result.message || "‚ùå Failed to submit request!"); } } catch (error) { console.error("Error submitting form:", error); alert("‚ö†Ô∏è Server error! Please try again later."); } }; return (
